1111001110011101 1000100011001100 0 -> sum: 0111110001101001, cout: 1

1111100100000011 0100000100110100 0 -> sum: 0011101000110111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
